Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    BottomSheetChoiceSelector.CurrentlySelectedChoice in [ThisItem.key, ThisItem.label],

    Substitute(
            BottomSheetChoiceSelector.ChoiceAccessibleName,
            "{OptionLabel}",
            ThisItem.label
    ),
    
    ThisItem.label
)

CustomProperties.Name: CurrentlySelectedChoice
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The currently selected choice text

CustomProperties.Name: AvailableChoices
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A table containing available choices to pick from.

CustomProperties.Name: OnSelect
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Behavior to trigger when a lifecycle state is selected.

CustomProperties.Name: OnCancel
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Behavior to trigger when the cancel button is pressed.

CustomProperties.Name: Title
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Title of the bottom sheet, or Blank(), when Blank() a notch is shown instead.

CustomProperties.Name: UseStaticOrdering
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Make the selected choice (if any) a part of the list and do not fiddle with ordering.

CustomProperties.Name: FocusBorderColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Color of the focus border.

CustomProperties.Name: FocusBorderThickness
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Thickness of focus border.

CustomProperties.Name: Loading
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Data is loading

CustomProperties.Name: LoadingChoicesText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Text to show when `Loading` is true

CustomProperties.Name: ChoiceAccessibleName
CustomProperties.Tooltip: An accessible label for each choice

CustomProperties.Name: ReturnFocus
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Where the focus should be after closing

CustomProperties.Name: ComponentInstanceName
CustomProperties.Tooltip: The name of the instance of this component

CustomProperties.Name: SelectedChoiceTooltip
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A tooltip for selected choice
